messages.title: YOUR CHOICE AT THIS ELECTION:
messages.content: STRONG, STABLE LEADERSHIP IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST or A COALITION OF CHAOS WITH JEREMY CORBYN

messages.title: STANDING WITH THERESA MAY
messages.content: Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? DON'T BE SO SURE. SHOCK WIN: PRESIDENT TRUMP, SHOCK WIN: BREXIT-EUROPE LEAVE VOTE, SHOCK WIN: CORBYN WAS 200-1 OUTSIDER

mentions.tacticalSituation: Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? DON'T BE SO SURE.

issues.economy: THE RISK IS JUST TOO BIG TO TAKE: HIGHER DEBT, HIGHER TAXES, ECONOMIC CHAOS

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet emphasizes the comparison between a 'strong, stable leadership' with Theresa May and a 'coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn', suggesting a strategic emphasis on leadership stability over specific policy positions. Historical voting surprises are used to suggest the possibility of unexpected outcomes.
